hobbies.title: Connecting With People
hobbies.descr: Interacting and socialising with people across the world. Exploring and learning more about individuals that come from different origins

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.descr: As Humans I believe that we have an innate thirst for knowledge, an d I personally find that satiating this desire through reading is the best option for me

hobbies.title: Long Lonely Walks
hobbies.descr: As much as  love people I do occasionally require some time to do sel-introspection. This helps me sort out my emotions and unclutter my mind.

hobbies.title: Gaming
hobbies.descr: Just like the next individual I really do enjoy playing a variety of video-games, majority being competitive multiplayer games.

hobbies.title: Hard Coding
hobbies.descr: Great way to stimulate my mind and access a level of creativity that's generally not accessible to me in my everyday life. It does not bring me joy, it bring me satisfaction.

Testimonials.name: Abdoelmaaliek Samaai
Testimonials.state: Waydin Jochem is a man that faces challenges head on and is not afraid to speak and give his opinion. He is the type of person you can go to for help and he finds ways to do things differently. He has a great interlect which is one of his good qualities.

Testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
Testimonials.state: Waydin is dedicated and very passionate about her work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.

Testimonials.name: Sidwell Batyi
Testimonials.state: Waydin is an energetic young lad, he is an extrovert that works great with teams because he adds his own energy to any situation which makes working with him a breeze

Testimonials.name: Meezan Davids
Testimonials.state: Waydin's eagerness to learn and willingness to ask questions have made him a valuable member of our team. He is new to coding but has been steadily improving his skills. His bright personality and positive attitude make working with him one on one a pleasure.

Testimonials.name: Amber-Kaye Africa
Testimonials.state: Waydin is a very wise and hard-working individual and is always willing to give his opinion on various matters. He has a great personality and always bring a team together. He is also a great delegator

Testimonials.name: Sibusiso Dyan
Testimonials.state: Waydin, great guy, focused individual, knows what he wants. His way of thinking and implementing his thoughts and planning into coding is great. Phenomenal guy, good team player and has a strong knowledge of coding.

projects.name: First Portfolio
projects.desc: My first portfolio I created, using BootStrap and HTML5. Was one of my first times designing a website and was quite enjoyable

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.desc: A simple Body Mass Indicator built using HTML5, BootStrap and JavaScript. One of my earlier appliactions made using JavaScript

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.desc: A To-Do list created using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. Was a tough appliaction to build after having just learnt the basics of JavaScript

projects.name: Calculator
projects.desc: A calculator created using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript, a creation that got me to start enjoying the capabalities that come from using JS

projects.name: E-commerce
projects.desc: An e-commerce made using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. Made using a JSON database hosted on Github Pages to render the data.

projects.name: FullStack
projects.desc: A fullstack application built alongside my assignment partner Connor WinkWork. This made use of restful APIs and VueJS
